timeline.bodyText:
I would suggest:
The content is not yet initialized. 
Detected direct or indirect call to 'getContent' from 'initContent'. 
You may not call any framework method on a 'Composite' instance before 'initContent' has completed initializing the component .

Rationale: The infinite loop symptom is because of our implementation choice, user does not need to be aware since it is prevented by this code. Also the last suggestion to "Call methods on the content component instead" may be assuming too much about what the dev is trying to do.
